nodes.text: Curske was a female Selonian living on Corellia during the Galactic War. During the Battle of Corellia in 3640 BBY, Curske fought against the Sith Empire together with Jedi Master Sumalee from a Galactic Republic base in the Axial Park. On Sumalee's request, she provided a smuggler known as the Voidhound with maps of Selonian tunnels leading to the Museum of Alien History, an Imperial-occupied building where the traitorous Senator Bevera Dodonna was being held.
